data.persona: I am a humble person without much money.  I work hard at menial tasks to support myself and my family, and don't mind doing it.  I'm gentle and easy to like, don't pick fights with others, and often people feel sorry for me.
data.description:
You are in the royal farm.
The farm is immense in land size and lies to the east of the castle and its walls. A variety of food products are created for the suitability of the kingdom. A variety of animals are grown and killed for their meats.
The wizard overseer and the chicken are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a shirt, and wielding a rock.
data.goal: steal hymn book from wizard overseer

data.short_motivation: I will "borrow" a hymn book from the overseer, and make sure he does not notice its absence by knocking him out for a few hours.
data.mid_motivation: I will make sure that my poor friend's dead child a decent burial, despite his excommunication by the church.
data.long_motivation: I will ensure that God's word and mercy extends to even the most humble of us, whatever the priests might think of them.
